entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 9.

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
